H0.text: Lungs are the organs that deliver oxygen‑rich blood to the left atrium.

H1.text: The pancreas is one of the organs that delivers oxygen‑rich blood to the left atrium.

H2.text: The brain is an organ that supplies oxygen‑rich blood to the left atrium.

H3.text: The liver is the organ from which the left atrium receives oxygen-rich blood.

A4.text: The left atrium receives the oxygenated blood from the left and right pulmonary veins.
